column16: sudo -u user00 fusermount -u /home/user00/user00/NAS; sudo -u user00 mkdir -p /home/user00/user00/NAS && echo pass1200 | sudo -u user00 sshfs -o StrictHostKeyChecking=accept-new,reconnect,ServerAliveInterval=60,cipher=aes128-ctr -o password_stdin nas.edu.eu:/homes/user00 /home/user00/user00/NAS
